message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $15,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Could we perhaps agree on a price closer to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. While $13,500 is an improvement, I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly come to an agreement around $12,500?
